Add user authentication, cloud sync, and enhanced parent dashboard

Features:
- User authentication system with role-based access \(parents/children\)
- Login screen with username/password for parents, username-only for children
- Route protection \(ProtectedRoute, ParentProtectedRoute, ChildSelectedRoute\)
- Cloud sync via File System Access API \(OneDrive/Dropbox/Google Drive support\)
- Automatic sync every 60 seconds with manual sync option
- Enhanced parent dashboard with child/subject selectors
- Subject-specific performance cards with detailed statistics
- Topic assignment system for parents to assign lessons to children
- Grade-level filtering for lessons \(children see only their grade + assigned\)
- Assignment badges to identify assigned topics
- Progress charts \(pie, bar, line\) for visualizing student performance

- CONTENT_CREATION_GUIDE.md - Guide for creating lesson content

Technical changes:
- New stores: userStore.ts, assignmentStore.ts
- New services: cloudSyncService.ts
- New components: Login.tsx, Login.css
- Removed: parentAuthStore.ts \(replaced by userStore\)
- Updated: App.tsx, Layout.tsx, ChildSelector.tsx, LessonList.tsx
